Welcome to resty’s documentation!¶

resty library provides user-friendly abstractions that allows you to easily write API interactions. This documentation contains guidance on how to install and use the library.

Contents:

  • Installation
    • Install resty
  • Getting started
    • Step 1: Configure the client
    • Step 2: Load the entrypoint and select a service
    • Step 3: Use filters
    • Step 4: Iterating through items
    • Step 5: Accessing metadata and usefull content
    • Step 6: Using links to interact with available relationships
    • Conclusion
